title: Sampler, ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Italian hemstitching, buttonhole, outline and satin stitches embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Scuola d'Industrie Italiane in New York through Florence Colgate Speranza
description: Fifteenth century style letters and rows of cross borders in brown and tan on a white ground fabric. Copied from a liturgical book.
